articles.title: Samsung toppled in Africa by little known Chinese smartphone brand - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung continues to lag behind Apple in North America, and now it's lost Africa too.
articles.content:

articles.title: US fashion brand Abercrombie & Fitch to close Singapore store on May 2 - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — American casual wear brand Abercrombie & Fitch said on Monday (April 19) that it will close its physical Singapore store on May 2. The firm arrived here amid some controversy less than a decade ago.

articles.description: Hawaii, Massachusetts, New Jersey, Oregon, Rhode Island and Vermont were the last states to expand eligibility on Monday. More than 131 million Americans have received at least one shot of a Covid-19 vaccine.
